Ladies and gentlemen, with a passion for
paper creation since childhood, Mr. Ha Chi Phu, who has lived in

decorative art.  Paper decoration creates
flexible and lifelike works
because using environmentally friendly paper materials
in decorative products not only
contributes to reducing polluting waste
but also brings colorful beauty to
life.
Combining two
famous Japanese art forms, Origami and
Kirigami, through skillful hands and
creativity, Mr. Phu often produces a variety of
paper products associated with
Vietnamese cultural life.  Flowers like roses, lotus flowers,
lilies, and a number of
other paper ornamental models with
meticulous steps from trimming and folding paper to ornamental
flowers, leaves, stems, and branches. Each
product takes about 30 to 120 minutes depending on  With
different shapes and levels of difficulty, when
I delve deeper into this job,
I quickly discover that there is
something that attracts me, and
my passion suddenly blossoms from there.
Simple art papers with

Mr. Phu's hands have become
unique, simple decorative products but still
bring elegance to big occasions.
He attracts a lot of
